document.heading: AMENDING SECTION 26.64.010, “STANDARDS,” OF CHAPTER 26.64, “DEDICATION OF LAND FOR COMMUNITY PURPOSES,” OF THE SAN MATEO MUNICIPAL CODE TO REMOVE VARIABLE CALCULATION FACTORS AND MODIFY FEE PAYMENT DEADLINES
